page.title: 08Yarm Parish Council
page.content: In 1894 Yarm Parish Council was established. The idea of the Parish Council originated in{feudal}times.In todays council the nine councillors who are elected meet in the{Town Hall every second Tuesday of the month. Todays Council looks after a{cemetery and the{allotments.}They pay someone to dig{graves}and keep the cemetry in good condition.50 years ago people lived in small cottages with no toilets or running water or garden,so they had allotments. Yarm Parish Council is also responsible for{Yarm Fair.}Today the Parish Council still get money from the people who own stalls and they use it to improve the area. {Stockton Borough Council}also ask for their opinion about planning application, footpaths and so on.
